lutassettypes.lutassettypes_new_name_field_DESCRIPTION: The field name of the layer to be renamed to from the 'Name' field.
lutassettypes.source_type_DESCRIPTION: Whether the source is an Excel file or a SQL table <'excel' or 'sql'>. If 'sql', include the database name.
lutassettypes.source_sql_db_name_DESCRIPTION: The database name if the source is a SQL table.

gridzones.feature_class_name_source_DETAILS: Required. The name of the feature class to be joined and exported. This is the 'Name' field in the lutassettypes_updated.xlsx file
gridzones.shapefile_name_target_DETAILS: Required. The target feature class name to be saved in the gdb or shp file.
gridzones.GridZoneId_field_DETAILS: Required. The field in the feature class used to join with the Excel table.
gridzones.join_excel_field_name_DETAILS: Required. The field in the Excel table used to join with the feature class.
